title: "How Hard Should We Push Generative AI ChatGPT Into Spewing Hate Speech, Asks AI Ethics And AI Law"
excerpt: "There is an effort afoot to try and get generative AI ChatGPT to produce foul essays that include hate speech and the like. This seems on the surface gallant but we might want to consider how far this ought to go."
